### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(y=-49.5)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 

### Copper cable factory
No entities found

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
-  Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected by a pipe before attempting to connect them.
-  Make sure that the pipe is placed in a valid position and that the entities are not already connected to another pipe.
### Errors when using burner mining drills
-  Ensure that the burner mining drill has enough fuel to operate before starting the mining process.
### Errors when using furnaces
-  Ensure that the furnace has enough fuel to operate before starting the smelting process.
-  Make sure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process.
### Errors when using offshore pumps
-  Ensure that the offshore pump is placed in a valid position and that it is connected to a boiler or other entity that can use the pumped fluid.
### Errors when using steam engines
-  Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a boiler or other entity that can provide the required fluid.
-  Make sure that the steam engine has enough fluid to operate before starting the generation process.
